articles.title: Bitcoin's Market Dynamics Shifts As BTC's Price Gradually Finds Stability In A New Range
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: Despite the significant volatility in the market, Bitcoin has managed to maintain its position above $80,000 support since it recovered the price level over a week ago. Bitcoin's market dynamics appear to be changing toward a new price territory as BTC's price undergoes a persistent bearish movement.

articles.title: Solana Fees Plunge To 2024 Lows: Will SOL Drop Below $100?
articles.author: 99 Bitcoins
articles.summary: Crypto is under immense selling pressure and Solana, one of the leading smart contract platforms, is facing headwinds. According to reports, revenue from gas fees is down to a six-month low and it's unlikely to break $100 soon.

articles.title: Scammers are now targeting crypto pros with fake job offers
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: Deribit flagged a surge in fake recruiters targeting developers and senior professionals. Scammers have pivoted into a new tactic to target crypto participants and are now coming for crypto job seekers as well as hacking victims. Deribit says it's not just about hacking anymore.

articles.title: AARP Commends Passage of Crypto Protections
articles.author: Steve Urness
articles.summary: On March 18, the ND Senate passed HB 1447 45-1-1. AARP applauds the passage and urges Governor Armstrong to sign the bill into law. Crypto scams cost North Dakotans $6 million in 2023 alone. Aarp urges the House to concur with the Senate version of the bill.
